pullRequest.title: Fix stats for dwrf encryption
pullRequest.bodyText:
Unencrypted stats need dummy entries for encrypted columns to ensure
backwards compatibility.
== NO RELEASE NOTE ==

nodes.bodyText: let's probably add something in OrcTester to exercise footer stats, and make sure, for example, there is nothing important set in the dummy stats entry

commit.message:
Fix stats for dwrf encryption

Unencrypted stats need dummy entries for encrypted columns to ensure
backwards compatibility.

Set sequenceId for dwrf columnEncodings

Since we now set the column encoding, we must also set the sequence id.
This will always be 0 since non-0 values are only for flat maps.

This will always be 0 since non-0 values are only for flat maps.
